txt.en:
[placeholder],

More news reaches my ears, and I am hopeful that you will want to visit so we can discuss its importance. Should you choose to, seek me out in Bree, and I will inform you of what is to be done.

Flambard Took
'It is good to see you again. There is news of something that I think you may find interesting.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Flambard Took
Flambard Took sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Flambard Took. He can be found near the Hunting Lodge in Bree.
